## Checklist

Please ensure your PR meets these requirements:

- [ ] Tool has a **genuine free tier** (not just a trial period)
- [ ] Free tier is **actually usable** for real projects
- [ ] Tool is **actively maintained** (checked recently)
- [ ] Website URL is **clean** (no affiliate/referral codes)
- [ ] Description is **clear and accurate** (20-500 characters)
- [ ] **Correct category** selected
- [ ] **JSON is valid** (tested locally)
- [ ] **No duplicate** entries
- [ ] Followed [CONTRIBUTING.md](../CONTRIBUTING.md) guidelines

**By submitting this PR, I confirm that:**

- The tool information is accurate and up-to-date
- I'm not affiliated with this tool (or have disclosed affiliation)
